numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows a high percentage of players of color in several sports.
2. The graph shows a low percentage of coaches of color in several sports.
3. This difference may mean that talent helps people of color to become players.
5. Systemic racism may make it harder for people of color to get managerial roles.
6. Systemic racism may make it harder for people of color to earn higher wages.
7. There is a gap between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of coaches of color.
8. In the NFL, the gap is 61%.
9. In the WNBA, the gap is 58%.
10. I wonder how the data from 2019 and 2020 compares to data from past years.
11. I want to see how this data compares to data from sports teams in other countries.
12. I wonder what society can do to remove barriers that prevent people of color from becoming head coaches.
15. Much of society is built on systemic racism.
16. People of color face challenges every day because of their skin color.
17. A large difference in racial distribution is apparent in big sports leagues.
18. I wonder if the difference is worse in smaller local sports leagues.
19. The alternate title of the graph is "Lack of Diversity in Sports: How Equal Really is the Field?"
